scripts.build:goerli: yarn prepare:goerli && graph codegen subgraph.yaml && graph build subgraph.yaml
scripts.build:mainnet: yarn prepare:mainnet && graph codegen subgraph.yaml && graph build subgraph.yaml
scripts.build:harbour_goerli: yarn prepare:harbour_goerli && graph codegen subgraph.yaml && graph build subgraph.yaml
scripts.build:harbour_mainnet: yarn prepare:harbour_mainnet && graph codegen subgraph.yaml && graph build subgraph.yaml
scripts.build:gnosis: yarn prepare:gnosis && graph codegen subgraph.yaml && graph build subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:goerli: yarn build:goerli && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ stakewise/stakewise-goerli
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn build:mainnet && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ stakewise/stakewise-mainnet
scripts.deploy:harbour_goerli: yarn build:harbour_goerli && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ stakewise/stakewise-perm-goerli
scripts.deploy:harbour_mainnet: yarn build:harbour_mainnet && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ stakewise/stakewise-harbour-mainnet
scripts.deploy:gnosis: yarn build:gnosis && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ stakewise/stakewise-gnosis
